column2: p3 <- ggplot(data = industries_filter, aes(x = industry,y = annual_avg_estabs, fill = industry)) + geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "dodge", width = 0.5) + labs(title = "Industry Total in San Bernardino County (2023)", y = "Annual Average Establishments", x = "Industry", caption = "Source: Buruea of Labor Statistics Quarterly Census on Employment and Wages" )
p3 + theme_linedraw() +theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = -370, hjust = 0))+ coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0,750))
